description:
Course Description

This course will help you if you have little or no design experience and want to create professional looking content on a budget. Canva is a design tool with a short learning curve that will help transform your business materials, social media content, memes, book covers and so much more.

What this course provides you:

This course will especially help those who are small business owners, online marketers, freelancers or even if you are just starting out in graphic design.

Canva Course:

Canva is a great design tool that anyone can use for free. It will help you create designs in no time and is easy to use.

What?

In less than 60 minutes you will figure out how to do the following:

  • Making and setting up your account.
  • Orienting around Canva's interface.
  • Selecting pre-made formats and layouts.
  • Creating logos.
  • Making artwork banners.
  • Designing an Ad for online promotion.
  • Sharing your designs.
  • Downloading your designs.

What else?

  • Discover Canva's many templates and pre-ready designs.
  • How to create customised designs and content.
  • Look at the free and paid structures of Canva.
  • Importing and exporting images and graphics.

Who?

  • Small businesses
  • Solopreneurs
  • Entrepreneurs
  • Technopreneurs
  • Online Marketers
  • Sponsors
  • Advertisers
  • Visual Designers
  • Online Networking Enthusiasts
title: Canva for Beginners - Design like a Pro
